name: Factorio trainee
description:
Third (kind of) person game for coursera Game Design and Development course. That should be 3d platformer but that was boring and i made a adventure game ("Квест", если по русски) with Factorio mechanics (how i was planing) and cutscenes.

All instructions in game.

You can find here such features as: 

  • Cutscene, animations and music;
  • sounds and effects;
  •  Resident evil (classic) style camera;
  • Item menu;
  • Factorio assambly lines (but without building mechanic - not enough time);
  • Hats!!! (only one - not enough time for more D:)

That's all i could do in 4 weeks.
